name: Nitesh Chaurasiya
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

full_output.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented individual with a strong foundation in problem-solving and a passion for continuous learning. Seeking to leverage my technical and interpersonal skills to contribute effectively to a dynamic and growth-oriented organization.

certifications.title: Machine Learning Foundations: A Case Study Approach

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Phishing Detection Extension
projects.description: Developed a Chromium-based extension to filter and block phishing domains using Machine Learning algorithms, achieving an accuracy rate of 98%. Implemented using Python, JavaScript, and machine learning libraries.

projects.name: AI Powered Mental Health Chatbot
projects.description: Engineered an AI-powered mental health chatbot integrating NLP techniques; leveraged advanced algorithms to analyze user input, delivering personalized recommendations for managing mental well-being and resources tailored to individual needs.

projects.name: Responsive Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website from scratch using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness. Integrated animations and interactive elements to enhance user experience.

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Contributed to a team-based project developing an e-commerce platform using React.js and Bootstrap. Integrated secure payment gateways and developed a user-friendly product filtering system.

full_output.name: Nitesh Chaurasiya
interests: Sketch Artist: Proficient in various drawing techniques and mediums, creating detailed and realistic artwork.
Cricket: Enthusiastic fast bowler, actively participating in local cricket leagues and tournaments.
achievements_and_awards: KAVACH 2023: Achieved first place in Kavach 2023, organized by the Ministry of Education, for developing a Phishing Detection Solution. Utilized Threat Intelligence feeds and sophisticated AI/ML Techniques to detect and prevent phishing attacks effectively

Engineering Day Event: Achieved first place in the Engineering Day event for creating a working model on the spot using waste materials, demonstrating innovative engineering and problem-solving skills.
